about_the_game:
The Winlu Fantasy Tileset - Dungeon pack offers a wide range of possibilities. From a simple cave, to a crystal mines and mining system, the tileset offers you a wide spectrum. Even gloomy torture chambers and sewers can be easily created. You can also build treasure chambers, lava dungeons, ancient dungeons or tombs, which are littered with traps, puzzles and secrets. Spikes and fire traps that come out of the ground add excitement to your game. Hidden doors and secret passages that disguise themselves as walls can also be built. Collapsing bridges, animated portals and teleporters bring life to your game!

Features:

25 character sheets
8 tile sheets

UPDATE MARCH 2024:

* Improved every tile (sharper edges)
* Improved the gold tiles
* Added new gold tiles
* Added new statues
* Reworked and improved the cave wall texture
* Improved stone texture transition land/water

UPDATE SEP 2024:

* Complete pixelart improvement of all tiles and sprites


Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
